Trade/Device Name(s): MicroScan MICroSTREP plus® Panel Clarithromycin (0.06-2 mcg/ml)
Specimen Type(s): Bacterial colonies (aerobic streptococci including Streptococcus pneumoniae, Streptococcus pyogenes, Streptococcus agalactiae, Streptococci (Groups C, F, G), viridans group streptococci)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for MicroScan MICroSTREP plus Panel for Clarithromycin antimicrobial susceptibility testing with manual and instrument read methods.
Indications for Use Summary: Determination of quantitative and/or qualitative antimicrobial susceptibility of aerobic streptococci, including Streptococcus pneumoniae, to Clarithromycin.
